title: Question:
author: alevlaslo
content: if everyone stops giving birth, aging will be replaced by rejuvenation and death will disappearnature stupidly reflects the will of the majority and recalculates the complexityI liked building housing - the climate became cold and wet I liked giving birth - death and aging appeared I liked the good - evil appearedI liked sewing clothes - my own disappeared, the person became naked And now the most important thing: in the opposite direction it also works, everything can be restored
